explains: n. [生化]类固醇（steroid 的复数形式）；甾体
wordGroup: anabolic steroid 合成代谢类固醇；促蛋白合成甾类

sentences.en: The athlete tested positive for steroids.
sentences.cn: 这个运动员类固醇检测呈阳性。

sentences.en: Two athletes tested positive for steroids.
sentences.cn: 两名运动员的类固醇试验呈阳性。

sentences.en: Unlicensed steroids are being disguised as herbal medicines.
sentences.cn: 无许可的类固醇被伪装成为草药。
